com.artemis

Class WorldConfigurationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.WorldConfigurationBuilder

  • public class WorldConfigurationBuilder
extends Object
    World builder. Allows convenient var-arg addition of systems, managers. Supports plugins.
    Author:
    Daan van Yperen
    See Also:
    WorldConfiguration

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  WorldConfigurationBuilder.Priority
      Guideline constants for priority, higher values has more priority.

      • dependsOn

        public final WorldConfigurationBuilder dependsOn(Class... types)
        Specify dependency on systems/plugins.

        Managers track priority separate from system priority, and are always added before systems.

        Parameters:
        types - required systems.
        Returns:
        this

      • dependsOn

        public final WorldConfigurationBuilder dependsOn(int priority,
                                  Class... types)
        Specify dependency on systems/plugins.

        Parameters:
        types - required systems.
        priority - Higher priority are registered first. Not supported for plugins.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        WorldConfigurationException - if unsupported classes are passed or plugins are given a priority.

      • dependsOnSystem

        protected void dependsOnSystem(int priority,
                   Class<? extends BaseSystem> type)
                        throws ReflectionException
        Throws:
        ReflectionException

      • with

        public WorldConfigurationBuilder with(int priority,
                             BaseSystem... systems)
        Register active system(s). Only one instance of each class is allowed. Use dependsOn(java.lang.Class...) from within plugins whenever possible.
        Parameters:
        systems - systems to add, order is preserved.
        priority - priority of added systems, higher priority are added before lower priority.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        WorldConfigurationException - if registering the same class twice.

      • with

        public WorldConfigurationBuilder with(BaseSystem... systems)
        Register active system(s). Only one instance of each class is allowed. Use dependsOn(java.lang.Class...) from within plugins whenever possible.
        Parameters:
        systems - systems to add, order is preserved.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        WorldConfigurationException - if registering the same class twice.

      • with

        public WorldConfigurationBuilder with(ArtemisPlugin... plugins)
        Add plugins to world.

        Upon build plugins will be called to register dependencies.

        Only one instance of each class is allowed. Use dependsOn(java.lang.Class...) from within plugins whenever possible.

        Parameters:
        plugins - Plugins to add.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        WorldConfigurationException - if type is added more than once.

      • withPassive

        public WorldConfigurationBuilder withPassive(int priority,
                                    BaseSystem... systems)
        Register passive systems. Only one instance of each class is allowed. Use dependsOn(java.lang.Class...) from within plugins.
        Parameters:
        systems - systems to add, order is preserved.
        priority - priority of added systems, higher priority are added before lower priority.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        WorldConfigurationException - if type is added more than once.
